Event.Message: NCA service status changed. New Status: (%1).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA status update. New Status: (%1, %2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Substatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA API Activity Start, function: (%1).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ApiFunction" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA API Activity End, function: (%1), error: (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ApiFunction" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA Evidence Collector Update, evcoll: (%1), old: (%2), new: (%3). User:(%4)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="EvColl" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Old" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="New" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="UserId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA Probe Start, type: (%1), resource: (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Type" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Resource" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA Probe End, type: (%1), resource: (%2), result: (%3)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Type" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Resource" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Result" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA Probe Callback, type: (%1), code: (%2), error: (%3)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Type" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Code" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA %1 Configuration Update started.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Source" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA %1 Configuration Update complete.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Source" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA Module %1 Initialization started.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ModuleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA Module %1 Initialization complete with error %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ModuleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA Module %1 Shutdown started.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ModuleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA Module %1 Shutdown complete.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ModuleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA Trigger %1. Details: (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Source" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Info" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: NCA PerfTrack Scenario Event. MachineId: %1, SessionId: %2, DeploymentId: %3, StopState: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MachineIdentifier" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SessionIdentifier" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DeploymentIdentifier" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StopState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
